IT TAKES A TITAN:
The Campaign for Cal State Fullerton 

Learn More






Member Benefits








Redpoint Travel Insurance
Enjoy the most comprehensive and flexible travel insurance protection against unexpected travel issues.






Athletics
Take advantage of buying one general admission ticket and get one general-admission ticket FREE to most Titan Athletic home games on game day at the box office.




Travel
Whether you are a recent grad or a seasoned alumni, we have the perfect travel excursion for you through our travel partners AESU and AHI.




Center for Entrepreneurship
Save 15% on consulting program services designed for your specific business needs by a dedicated CSUF consulting team.




CSUF Performing Arts
Receive the “Titan discount” rate on advance purchase tickets at the on-campus box office.




Complimentary Parking Passes
Members receive three on-campus parking vouchers through the ParkMobile app, each voucher redeemable for one parking session. Contact alumnimembership@fullerton.edu to receive yours!




Titan Shops
Receive a one-time 20% discount on a CSUF gift or apparel item with coupon.




CSUF Access to all 23 CSU libraries
Present your Titan Alumni Card for book borrowing privileges.




Extension and International Programs
Receive a $50 discount on one non-credit continuing education course.




Student Recreation Center
Members of the Association are eligible to purchase an SRC membership. Visit the SRC to learn more!

















Contacts and Addresses   |   General: 657-278-2011    |   Emergency Closure Info: 657-278-4444
